1541460.name: Jumps VR Demo
1541460.description:
Jumps VR is a fast paced first person platformer, where you have a limited amount of jumps to complete each level. Keep collecting jump tokens and powerups to make it through to the end. Each world introduces exciting new game mechanics to figure out and master, including trampolines, cannons, rocket jumping and more!

Jumps VR builds upon the original game, Jumps, now with full motion controls and fast-paced VR platforming.
